models.items: A curated collection of GitHub repositories and code experiments showcasing technical depth and open-source contributions.

items.title: GSAP Morphing Engine
items.description: Experimental SVG path morphing engine using GSAP and custom easing functions for fluid character animations.

items.title: Minimalist WebGPU Wrapper
items.description: A zero-dependency wrapper for WebGPU to simplify pipeline creation and compute shader management.

items.title: React Neural Hook
items.description: Custom hook for running lightweight brain.js models directly within the React render cycle.

items.title: CSS Grid Debugger
items.description: Browser extension that visualizes complex CSS Grid layouts with overlay guides and naming hints.
